column4: Evening good people. I've been having trouble finding a solution to my problem on the forums: My wireless network connection speed is always displayed as "Unknown" in the connection information window and 0 kb/s bit rate in iwconfig. (Atheros, AR9285, ath9k driver, Ubuntu 10.04).

It appears the thread you linked is about enabling the wireless adapter. My only problem is that it doesn't show connection speed, while it works properly. Though I'm not sure if I get proper WifiN speeds
